description: This file defines the WorkoutAdapter class, a RecyclerView adapter used in an Android frontend to display workout entries, including functionalities to update data, create view holders, and bind data to views.

classes.name: WorkoutAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of WorkoutEntry items, with functions to update data and manage view holders.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Replaces the current list of items with a new list and refreshes the displayed data.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder by inflating the item layout.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of items in the list.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a WorkoutEntry at a specific position to the corresponding ViewHolder.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that holds references to the views within each item of the RecyclerView.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Method to update the adapter's dataset and refresh the view.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder with the inflated item view.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of WorkoutEntry items.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from WorkoutEntry to the ViewHolder's views.
